alert.note: Alert for Clay; Greene (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 18 at 9:21AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Greene and central Clay Counties through 945 AM CST... At 920 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Peach Orchard, or 12 miles south of Corning, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corning, Lafe, Knobel, Pollard, McDougal, Peach Orchard, Delaplaine, Evening Star, Beech Grove, Crockett, Stonewall, Tipperary, Hickoria, Case, Brookings and Knob. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
